page.title: 05Collingb'ne Everleigh Houses
page.content: Of the two dozen properties in Collingbourne Kingston approx. two thirds are tied houses the remainder being privately owned. Due south of Collingbourne Kingston is an are of 24 Council properties known as The Knapp, and to the west of this is a private estate of 12 bungalows known as Sunny Hill. Some of the council properties have recently been purchased by the long standing tenants. Of the 45 residential properties in Everleigh only a small percentage are tied and council housing for the elderly. All houses have mains electricity, water and sewerage, Everleigh boasting its own American built sewage works, but no mains gas supply exists in the area. The water supply for both villages comes from their own deep artesian wells.
